# Skyline Runner (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 4]], [[City (Domain)|City 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance**: No

**Source:** Races of Destiny (WotC), pg. 168

You can walk normally on any city surface as if it were level ground. This includes perfectly vertical walls, glass windows, and even clothes-drying lines. Your movement speed remains unchanged, even when walking straight up a wall.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 4, Wizard 5 to Level.
